answers.answer: Did it look kind of like a bunch of cotton, but see-through?
it was see through but did not look like cotton.  it looked like a tube about size of finger made of a thin layer of skin with air in it

question: Can anyone explain to me what this could be or the cause of it.  Last night I noticed a white, air filled, membrane floating in bowel movement(currently suffering diarrhea and excessive gas.)  I have a lot of health problems and dread going to doctor if there is a simple non-harmful reason for it.Medical conditions:  Diabetes, GERD, Tachycardia, CHF, Depression, Sleep Apnea
title: white air filled membrane in bowel movement
